alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Niobrara and east central Converse Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 315 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Keeline, or 18 miles west of Lusk, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Niobrara and east central Converse Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County
